section-block.flip_chart-concept-question: What makes us who we are?

flip_chart-centered-content.flip_chart-teacher-facing-paragraph: !My favorite book sits on the shelf. One day I’ll read it by myself.
You run fast. I run slow. I like to catch. You like to throw.
I like to feed our classroom bunny. Her wiggly nose is very funny.
I draw four lines and make a square. I trace a circle and draw a bear.
We find a bin of wooden blocks. We make a tower and then fill a box.
Our stomachs rumble. It’s time to eat. Here comes the pizza! What a treat
